title: Menzies visits Malaya
brief_description: Records the welcome given to Sir Robert Menzies during his five day goodwill visit to Malaya in 1959. Shows Menzies swapping gifts with Tunku Abdul Rahman, visiting Parliament and reviewing Australian troops while Dame Pattie Menzies visits the hospital and speaks to the Women’s Institute. Suitable for upper secondary level.
